page.title: 17 PUBLISHED NEWS
page.content: May 8th. Rockhampton's celebrations for VE Day were well supported.People danced until the early hours of the morning.The Church Hall was decorated with bunting and flags from the Allied Countries who fought in the Second World War.Memorabilia from the War was on display as well as lots of red, white and blue flowers. May 17th. HM Detention Centre advertised for a teacher of Horticultural Mechanics.Minimum 5 years experience.Salary 7794-9386 pounds per year. June 7th. HM Detention Centre made more strict by Leon Britton, Home Secretary. Regime made inmates march, do parades and scrub floors.Sentences are from 2 weeks to 4 months for burglary, car theft etc.Inmates get 3 meals daily and recreation includes weight-lifting and gym training.
